detailsData.title: Over 73 Years
detailsData.content: With over 73 years of experience, Lacy Katzen LLP brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to every case they handle.

detailsData.title: Highly Ranked
detailsData.content: Lacy Katzen LLP is ranked by Best Lawyers as a Best Law Firm and has nine attorneys listed in Best Lawyers in America.

detailsData.title: Super Lawyers
detailsData.content: The firm boasts six attorneys named as Super Lawyers, highlighting their exceptional legal skills and client service.

detailsData.title: Ethical Service
detailsData.content: Lacy Katzen LLP is committed to ethically serving their clients with excellence and teamwork each day, ensuring high ethical standards in all they do.

companyName: Lacy Katzen LLP Attorneys at Law
valueProp: Based in Rochester and with locations in surrounding areas, Lacy Katzen LLP serves a diverse client community with a wide range of legal needs. If you’re here, you probably need help and are looking for the best fit for your situation. Our dedicated Rochester lawyers understand that it can be challenging to find the right attorney, especially if you have not previously needed the help of a law firm. Fortunately, you’ve come to the right place. Contact us today to learn about how we can assist you.

testimonalData.text: This company has been amazing. They provided me with the best, most honest, knowledgeable and sincere attorney that anyone can ask for. Attorney Peter Rodgers treated us like family and kept us informed every step of the way.
testimonalData.author: Olive C.

testimonalData.text: John Wells truly impressed us by quickly returning a phone call late on a Friday afternoon. His demeanor was calming and caring. John was informative, explained matters clearly, and steps we needed to take. At one point he said it was his job to worry about that particular item.
testimonalData.author: Kellie G.

testimonalData.text: I contacted Lacy Katzen after seeing positive reviews online and I couldn't have been more satisfied with the service. Attorney John Wells helped me get a settlement with a veterinarian following a negligent act. He was very concise in reviewing the case and detailing what my options were.
testimonalData.author: Karol H.
